# File lib/midilib/sequence.rb, line 94
    def note_to_length(name)
      name.strip!
      name =~ /^(dotted)?(.*?)(triplet)?$/
      dotted, note_name, triplet = $1, $2, $3
      note_name.strip!
      mult = 1.0
      mult = 1.5 if dotted
      mult /= 3.0 if triplet
      len = NOTE_TO_LENGTH[note_name]
      raise "Sequence.note_to_length: \"#{note_name}\" not understood in \"#{name}\"" unless len
      return len * mult
    end
